None.Name: Revive
None.Description: Gathers corpses in a 25m radius in order to summon a maximum of 3 Skeleton Warriors with their Unholy Armor enabled. For summoning a unit Skeleton Warriors 600 life points have to be gathered from corpses first. Skeleton Warriors have the same upgrade level as the spell itself. Reusable every 20 seconds.
